definition: (coll.) to regret/what a pity! (loanword from Japanese "zannen")
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
at one's wit's end/unable to find a way out
to have one's spirits dampened/to feel disappointed
to have a close call/to have a narrow escape
to be made to stand still as a punishment
and so on/in a similar fashion
impossible/can't be done/no can do/unable to accomplish
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
